tags.name: m-accordion
tags.description: AMP Accordion. Allows you to create "accordions" in emails

attributes.name: animate
attributes.description: Animated folding and unfolding of sections

tags.name: m-accordion-body
tags.description: AMP Body of an Accordion Section. Allows you to create the body of a section in an accordion.

tags.name: m-accordion-section
tags.description: AMP Section of an Accordion. Allows you to create a section in an accordion.

attributes.name: expanded
attributes.description: display expanded by default (works only in the amp version of the letter)

tags.name: m-accordion-title
tags.description: AMP Title of an Accordion Section. Allows you to create a clickable section heading in the accordion that expands or collapses the content of the section

tags.name: m-body
tags.description: The overall wrapping of the entire email. The tag is required and can be used in the email only once.

attributes.name: bgcolor
attributes.description: The background color of the entire email

tags.name: m-box
tags.description: Stacking blocks. Can only be used inside m-boxes

attributes.name: align
attributes.description: Horizontal alignment. Can be **left / right / center**

attributes.name: valign
attributes.description: Vertical alignment. Can be **top / bottom / middle**

tags.name: m-boxes
tags.description: Wrapping for stacking blocks, can only contain m-box elements

attributes.name: align
attributes.description: Horizontal alignment. Can be **left / right / center**

attributes.name: valign
attributes.description: Vertical alignment. Can be **top / bottom / middle**

attributes.name: inverted
attributes.description: Reverses the direction of block stacking.

tags.name: m-button
tags.description: Button

attributes.name: font-size
attributes.description: Font size in px or pt

attributes.name: border
attributes.description: Border width, style and color, e.g., 1px solid #000000

attributes.name: width
attributes.description: Button width in px or percents

tags.name: m-carousel
tags.description: AMP Carousel. Allows you to create carousels of images and content inside the email

attributes.name: width
attributes.description: Carousel width. Must be set in pixels

attributes.name: height
attributes.description: Carousel height. Must be set in pixels

attributes.name: layout
attributes.description: The layout of the carousel. Allowed values:  fill, fixed, fixed-height, flex-item, intrinsic, nodisplay, responsive

attributes.name: autoplay
attributes.description: Carousel autoplay: the slides advance without user interaction

tags.name: m-column
tags.description: Non-stacking block. (similar to a table cell). Can only be used inside an m-row element

attributes.name: align
attributes.description: Horizontal alignment. Can be left | right | center

attributes.name: valign
attributes.description: Vertical alignment. Can be top | bottom | middle

attributes.name: width
attributes.description: Block width in px or percents

attributes.name: padding
attributes.description: Padding. Can be set by 1 to 4 parameters in px, according to the CSS standard

tags.name: m-form
tags.description: AMP form. Allows you to create forms in an email

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: Specifies the state of the form. Upon successful submission, the state changes to ‘true’, which can be used to hide the form

attributes.name: on
attributes.description: AMP event handler. If set or generated automatically, the ID of the m-form element will be substituted for formId

tags.name: m-form-error
tags.description:
Allows you to display a validation error message when a form is submitted.
Can only be nested within an m-form 
Supports output patterns with double square brackets

tags.name: m-form-success
tags.description:
Displays a form success message.
Can only be nested within an m-form
Supports output patterns with double square brackets

tags.name: m-head
tags.description: Specifies the preheader parameters. Can contain a style tag with the description of styles.

tags.name: m-img
tags.description: Adds an image.

attributes.name: href
attributes.description: If the attribute is set, the image will turn into a link

attributes.name: alt
attributes.description: Alt text — the text that the user will see if the image is not displayed

tags.name: m-padding
tags.description: Creates a vertical indent

tags.name: m-row
tags.description: Wraps non-stacking blocks (similar to a table row). Can only contain m-column elements

attributes.name: width
attributes.description: The width. Can be specified as pixels or percentages

tags.name: m-separator
tags.description: Separator (a horizontal line)

attributes.name: padding
attributes.description: the indent size before and after the line

tags.name: m-style
tags.description: Hosts your own styles, similar to the style tag

tags.name: m-template
tags.description:
Tag for using amp-mustache The amp-mustache component alone cannot be used in TJML. For it to work correctly, pick the m-template where necessary. To insert dynamic elements, use double square brackets 
 [[]]
instead of curly brackets 
 {{}}

tags.name: m-text
tags.description: Adds text or link. Can contain regular html tags, e.g., <a>, <b>, etc.

attributes.name: font-size
attributes.description: Font size in px or pt

attributes.name: line-height
attributes.description: Line height in px or percents

attributes.name: href
attributes.description: A link. If the attribute is specified, the text will be a link

tags.name: m-wrap
tags.description: Wraps any element. Allows you to limit the width, set the background color or background image

attributes.name: width
attributes.description: Block width in px or percents

attributes.name: outlook-width
attributes.description: Allows you to set a custom width for Outlook (used for widescreen emails)

attributes.name: padding
attributes.description: Padding. Can be set by 1 to 4 parameters in px, according to the CSS standard

attributes.name: outlook-background-image
attributes.description: Allows you to set a custom background image for Outlook and Lotus (used for widescreen emails)

attributes.name: background-position
attributes.description: Background image position (Lotus and Outlook will ignore this attribute)

attributes.name: align
attributes.description: Horizontal alignment. Can be left | right | center

attributes.name: valign
attributes.description: Vertical alignment. Can be top | bottom | middle

tags.name: tj-ui
tags.description: The tag is required and contains only an m-body. Forms the framework interface

attributes.name: pixel-perfect
attributes.description: The URL to the email mockup image for testing in the Pixel Perfect mode.

attributes.name: theme
attributes.description: dark or light theme of UI. System theme used by default
